docs.snippet: Minnesota announced the signing of Hunter, a 39-year-old outfielder, to a $10.5 million, one-year contract, and the injured Atlanta pitchers Kris Medlen and Brandon Beachy were among 32 players who were thrown into the free-agent market....
docs.lead_paragraph: Minnesota announced the signing of Hunter, a 39-year-old outfielder, to a $10.5 million, one-year contract, and the injured Atlanta pitchers Kris Medlen and Brandon Beachy were among 32 players who were thrown into the free-agent market.

headline.print_headline: Hunter Returns to Twins; Medlen, Beachy Let Go

docs.snippet: Florida State quarterback Jameis Winston and the woman who has said he sexually assaulted her spent nearly five hours in separate rooms at a closed-door hearing recounting what happened nearly two years ago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Florida State quarterback Jameis Winston and the woman who has said he sexually assaulted her spent nearly five hours in separate rooms at a closed-door hearing recounting what happened nearly two years ago.

headline.main: Jameis Winston Hearing Adjourns, Resumes Wednesday
